channel.title: Battlescape help
channel.description:
ok so im trying to code battlescape and i just started and i found up that there is no pickup command.
so i need somone to give me pickup command code for battlescape source. source im using : nocturnal pk please dont flame and btw dont say search bar ive looked everywhere
also there is something in the client were i cant change the clients name ive changed nocturnalpk to legendpkz in every single folder and still the name is nocturnal pk and yes i compiled and re run the cllient still wont change.
bump
so can anyone help?
